Correct: Donald Trump Jr. is being sued by Lt. Col. Alexander Vindman, the whistleblower who sparked the first impeachment of former President Trump.

Vindman was the first to file a complaint regarding a call between Trump and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky in which Trump appeared to withhold military support to Ukraine unless Zelensky agreed to investigate President Joe Biden’s dealings there.

The article goes on to state the following:
“The targeted campaign against Lt. Col. Vindman violated federal civil rights laws that have long protected federal officials from intimidation and retaliation,” the lawsuit said.

Colonel Alexander Vindman, the whistleblower who kicked off former President Donald Trump’s first impeachment, sued [Donald Trump Jr.] Wednesday for waging a “targeted campaign” against him following his original complaint.

pic.twitter.com/J7E6wBRI8l
— Rep Andy Biggs (@RepAndyBiggsAZ) November 19, 2019
